Making Software. Better.

Equal Experts is a network of talented, experienced software consultants, specialising in agile delivery.

Case studies

  •

    Improving platform stability through automation

    Read Intersection case study

  • Building a digital neobank from scratch

    Read Xinja case study

  • A big shift in how rotas work at Co-op.

    Read Co-op Food case study
All clients and case studies

Join us for ExpertTalks

We run ExpertTalks events for the wider software community, in key tech hubs around the world.

Find out where

A decade of Equal Experts

We’re nothing without our people – so to mark 10 years of working together, we asked them to share what they value about our network.

10 years together

Services

We bring maturity, pragmatism and passion to software projects of all shapes and sizes – everything from mobile apps to enterprise-level technology platforms.

View our services

A proven approach to mobile

Our engineering practices ensure rigour and quality whatever we work on – and mobile is no exception.

Our mobile story

We're heading to the stratosphere

Say hello to Equal Experts Space Agency. We’re supporting our Associates as they aim for a lofty ambition: beating a world record set by NASA.

Take off

Our people

Covering all aspects of end-to-end software delivery, our consultants typically have at least 10 years’ experience in developing commercial software.

Read about our people

Blog

Our Blog

  • Our Thinking

    The decision is… mine!
  • Our Thinking

    Introducing agile practices, part 2: nurturing incubation
  • EE Life

    Paving the way to a more open, sharing network
Visit our blog

Contact us

If you’d like to work with us – as a client or consultant – we’d love to hear from you. You’ll find our offices in the UK, US, Portugal, India, Canada, South Africa, Australia and Germany.

Get in touch

Simple solutions to big business problems.
